title: Design-Based Learning (DBL) Project for Solving Higher Education Mathematics Problems

context.prior_knowledge: University-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and basic programming knowledge
context.additional_context: A project-centered course solving industry-based mathematical problems through design thinking. Students perform team assignments using LMS and collaboration tools in a BYOD environment, with summative assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: They can mathematically model real-world industrial problems and design optimization solutions.
They enhance communication skills using collaboration tools while performing team-based mathematical design projects.
They strengthen integrated thinking skills to apply mathematical theories to real-world problem-solving through the DBL (Design-Based Learning) process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
